meanings.sent1: I used a toonie to buy some candy.
meanings.sent2: The toonie has a polar bear on it.
meanings.sent3: The toonie rolled away and hid under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The toonie shone like a tiny moon in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent5: I found a shiny toonie on the sidewalk.

meanings.sent1: My favorite toonie is the one with the funny hat.
meanings.sent2: The toonie always makes me laugh with its silly antics.
meanings.sent3: The toonie slipped on a banana peel and landed in a puddle.
meanings.sent4: The toonie's smile brightened up the whole cartoon world.
meanings.sent5: I wish I could meet a real-life toonie like in the show.
